ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And the Companions of the Left: what of the Companions of the Left?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But those of the left hand -- how (unhappy) those of the left hand --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for the People on the Left: how miserable will be the People on the Left!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: As for the people on the left hand, how miserable they will be!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those on the left – how (wretched) are those on the left!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those on the left How will be those on the left
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And those of the left hand, how wretched are those of the left hand!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The Companions of the Left (O Companions of the Left!)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those on the left hand: What of those on the left hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those on the Left: how unfortunate are those on the Left!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the fellows on the left hand; how miserable Shall the fellows on the left hand be!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And the People of the Left Hand—what are the People of the Left Hand?!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Companions of the Left Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Left Hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those on the Left Hand Who will be those on the Left Hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As for the Companions of the Left
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those on the Left—what of those on the Left?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:41] And those of the left [hand] — what of those of the left [hand]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 642 (And those on the left hand) the inhabitants of the Fire: (What of those on the left hand) what do you know, Muhammad, about the degradation and punishment of the people of the Fire?
